text: Hi all, I am experiencing slow server response times from HubSpot projects via a serverless function. It takes between 2s en 5s to perform the request. It does a request to the stripe api in the mean time. Does it has to be this slow? Can you help with ideas how to speed things up?

Hi there, I am creating a membership portal using Serverless function. A lot of data comes from HubDB. contact search pagination and filter is done using serverless function. If the member user increases the API limit too increase. Is there a way to cache the serverless function API call data?
